alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hardee, northeastern Manatee, southwestern Polk and northwestern DeSoto Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jan Phyl Village to near Bartow to 8 miles northeast of Myakka City. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Bartow, Lake Wales, Wauchula, Ona, Myakka City, Jan Phyl Village, Fort Meade, Crooked Lake Park, Mulberry, Frostproof, Bowling Green, Eagle Lake, Zolfo Springs, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Homeland, Alturas, Limestone, and Brownville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
